bibl.title: New Ancient Village in Mareotis.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.author: NEGM, Mohamed Abdel Aziz

bibl.note: 1989 excavations at Tel el Shewelhi (1,5 km south-west of Abu Mina): the architectural aspects were seen in wine presses, houses, shops, stores and water basins.
NEGM Mohamed Abdel Aziz, New Ancient Village in Mareotis.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 217-223, pll. XXXIII-XXXV.
